p: Several HMPV vaccines have been produced and tested in pre-clinical studies [ 29, 30]. These include recombinant vaccines such as vaccines based on alpha virus or bovine PIV3 [ 59, 60, 61]. Killed virus has been tested, although there is a concern that killed virus may exacerbate disease, as was the case in the 1960s when a formalin-inactivated RSV vaccine was clinically tested [ 62]. Protein, peptide, and virus like particle (VLP) vaccines have also been tried. Live-attenuated HMPV vaccines have been produced, including cold-adapted variants and viruses with mutations in the F or polymerase proteins [ 30].
